channel.title: [delta] Mute wont work with ::yell [317] rep++
channel.description: if a player is muted he can still ::yell and evryone can see how ti fix this i rep++

item.title: [delta] Mute wont work with ::yell [317] rep++
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

xocean:

Lol ipmute is for player rights 0? nice…

No, its for player rights greater than 0…

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:4, topic:374466”]if (command.startsWith("yell") && donator >= 0) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("["+playerName+"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }[/quote]

Try this:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && donator >= 0) {
    String text = command.substring(5);
    if(!muted){
        yell("["+playerName+"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
    } else {
        sM("You are muted and cannot yell!");
    }
}

the “!muted” might need altering depending on how it’s done on your server. !=not, so it’s basically saying IF the player is not muted it will yell, ELSE if he is muted he will get a message in the chat box saying he can’t yell

Read full topic

item.title: [delta] Mute wont work with ::yell [317] rep++
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

rova1:

you must edit it into your yell command, so it checks if their muted when they try to yell

if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mod nick”)) {
sM(“You have abused this, you can’t ban anyone!”);
} else {
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
if(playerRights <= p.playerRights) {
sM(“You can’t mute anyone of the same rank or higher than you!”);
} else if(playerRights > p.playerRights) {
p.muted = true;
writeLog(p.playerName, “mutes”);
sM(“You have muted “+p.playerName+”!”);
yell("["+playerName+"] has just Muted “+p.playerName+”!");
}

                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
}
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }
        if (command.startsWith("ipmute") && playerRights > 0) {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(7);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    writeLog(p.connectedFrom, "mutes2");
		p.muted = true;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been ip muted by " + playerName);
		sM("You have ip muted "+p.playerName+"");
                    yell("["+playerName+"] has just IP Muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to ip mute..");
            }
        }

this is my Mute and Ip mute command
and here is my yell command

if (command.startsWith("yell") && donator >= 0) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("["+playerName+"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic
